channel.title: Feature request: keyboard shortcut to toggle 'Live'
channel.description: Title says it all. It could be really handy i guess. Being Renoise user i got used to push Esc(instead of clicking Rec button with mouse) to enter pattern edit mode for example. Maybe we can have something like this?

item.title: Feature request: keyboard shortcut to toggle 'Live'
item.dc:creator: @kausto Kuzma Palkin
item.description:
@kausto wrote:

Ah thanks! Overlooked it.

Read full topic
item.source: Feature request: keyboard shortcut to toggle 'Live'

item.title: Feature request: keyboard shortcut to toggle 'Live'
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

CMD+E (ctrl+e I guess on windows) - you can see this in the menus
